date: Tue Mar 22 2022 20:59:59 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
description: The Supreme Court announced Sunday that Justice Clarence Thomas has been hospitalized since Friday evening. The longest-serving member of the high court was diagnosed with an infection, and is being treated with intravenous antibiotics. Thomas, the court's most senior conservative, will participate in the consideration and discussion of any cases for which he is not present on the basis of the briefs, transcripts, and audio of the oral arguments.
metaDescription: Justice Clarence Thomas has been hospitalized and diagnosed with an infection and is being treated with intravenous antibiotics.
generatedText: Clarence Thomas, a former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, said the U.S. should not be "trying to

Justice Clarence Thomas Hospitalized with Flulike Symptoms
Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas has been hospitalized and is being treated for an infection.
What we know about Justice Clarence Thomas' hospitalization
Justice Clarence Thomas remains hospitalized in Washington after being diagnosed with an infection but does not have COVID-19, the Supreme Court said ...

A court spokesperson told CBS News that Thomas does not have COVID-19.
